/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and buses can be seen in motion, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
